text: Boxer is a 1995 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Baiju Kottarakkara, starring Babu Antony and Haritha in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Babu Antony as Jimmy Cheriyan * Haritha as Ishwarya * Jagathy Sreekumar as Pachalam Sundharan * Baiju Kottarakkara * Vijay Menon * Sathar as Home Minister * Sukumaran as Adv. John Samuel * Krishnankutty Nair as Shakthidharan Pillai * Abu Salim as Keey Brouw * Anil Murali as Dinesh * A. C. Zainuddin as Pollachi Raaja * Anusha * Augustine as Prasannan * Jagannadha Varma as DGP Somashekharan * Mamukkoya as Mammad * Narendra Prasad as Rajagopalan Thampy * Shammi Thilakan as SI * Sreejaya as Reena Cheriyan * Gavin Packard as Mukharji Dayal * Biju Pappan == Soundtrack == ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Boxer (1995 film)
